contest-event.event-date: April 2, 1945 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Youth Own Choice Test Piece Contest De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 18th annual Leicester Band Festival, and also Midlands Area qualifying contest. Prizes - 1st £10 and bowl, 2nd £8 and trophy, 3rd £5, 4th £3. 6 bands competed. March 2, 2013, 12:44 p.m. Feb. 5, 2019, 1:17 p.m. 1 Jaguar Land Rover Band Jack Major 2 Norfolk Brass Ensemble Edgar Ruffles 3 1st Leicester Army Cadets A. Bennett 4 Barrow Hill and Staveley Works Junior Unknown Unknown Result Leicester A.T.C. Unknown Unknown Result Leicester Sea and Air Cadets Unknown
